text: @ZekeJMiller @PressSec Don’t know why you guys mad with poor Kayleigh. Possibly the first true statement from her as a PSuck, oops PSec. We really are a leader in Covid-19 (which is the name of the disease). What is wrong with this statement people? Please give her credit.
